title: Screamtime: Haunted House, Holy Water
dc:creator: WBUR
description: When Alex was in high school, he and his best friend used to break into abandoned houses. Alex was a tough guy, giving people hell. Until one night, in one of those abandoned houses... hell gave him something back.
itunes:author: WBUR
